alert.note: Alert for Clay; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:20PM CDT until July 13 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... North central Wilkin County in west central Minnesota... East central Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mapleton, or 7 miles west of Fargo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fargo, Moorhead, West Fargo, Dilworth, Horace, Glyndon and Harwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 54 and 73. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 345 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
